segments.text: Ugh, what a mess in that kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pouring everywhere, soaking the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman just standing there, clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle, probably ruining her shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, filthy hands in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Climbing on a stool like wild animals.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl begging for stolen goods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All this water damage, what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies will be stale from their grubby paws.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is sloppy and uncontrolled.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the garden looks too perfect for this sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching such carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR
